People with Perry syndrome typically survive for about 5 years after signs and symptoms first appear. Most affected individuals ultimately die of respiratory failure or pneumonia. Suicide is another cause of death in this condition.",GHR,Perry syndrome
How many people are affected by Perry syndrome ?,Perry syndrome is very rare; about 50 affected individual
